title: emmaglory5

comments.author: smyslov
comments.body: The red tag is very much visible on my end OP also has a flag raised he like posting scam projects, imitation projects like this New Luna can be considered a scam, we have a lot of scam projects already and many of these are imitations of projects that gone viral like Dogecoin, Elon Musk and now this New Luna Classic, even if its an airdrop they will entice you to buy their shitcoin.

comments.body: You guys do know the only way you get the airdrop is to have the original Luna/Terra right? So if you hold it,,, you will get it, no need to launch or do any new ones.This is how a scam perpetuates itself,,, feel sorry if you got scammed by Classic original Terra but I will not feel sorry if you go back in to get fooled all over again!
